name: Bat of Dead
storyline:
In this game you take on the role of a bat in a world full of madness, crazy dangers, strange creatures and unrealistic charismatic ducks for the bathroom !!!
You can run with a bat. Walk with a bat.
The strangest thing you've seen in your life.
Looking for the weirdest games?
You have come to the right place !!!
Two games in one.
Plunge into a history full of secrets.
Can a bat take off?
Whose story will this game tell you?
New and old gaming experiences are blended together.
Hardcore and casual are now united in this new game!
Much work has been done on the bugs in the update!
summary: You are waiting for adventure and emotion. 2 for the price of one.
